articles.title: SA's Louis Oosthuizen has no regrets about hitting driver at 17 - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Reuters reports one poor drive ultimately cost Louis Oosthuizen a chance of winning the US Open at Torrey Pines on Sunday, but the South African said he would probably take the risky shot on again if he was given the chance.
